author: gstein
msg: Fix some bucket destruction issues, and revamp the request construction
(serf_request_t): new, opaque type for a request
as a constructor for serf_request_t objects.
(serf_request_deliver): new function, picking up from the old
serf_connection_request_create function. it provides the necessary
data for a request, and schedules it for delivery.
a tweak to the param list.
(serf_request_get_pool): new function to return a request's pool
(serf_request_get_alloc): new function to return a request's bucket
(struct serf_request_t): renamed from request_t. added a connection
object so we can "get back home', and added a bucket allocator
specific to this request/response pair. all users changed.
(update_pollset): new function to adjust the read/write desirability of
(open_connections): store the socket into the connection. use the new
(write_to_connection): call update_pollset() when we run out of requests
to write out. we want to disable looking for writeability.
(read_from_connection): call update_pollset when we've read all
responses. we don't want to try reading any more.
(serf_default_destroy_and_data): helper function to destroy the bucket,
(serf_file_peek): tweak: len is only an output paramter; we should be
(serf_aggregate_read): destroy the buckets when we're done with them.
(serf_simple_destroy): use serf_default_destroy_and_data to get rid of
serf_default_destroy_and_data in place of manual (incorrect) code.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add a new commons website meant for commons.apache.org.
Lots of changes that I'm not going to detail.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add shells for file and mmap buckets.  Fix buglet in simple_buckets.c's peek.
implementation of file and MMAP buckets.
* gen2/Makefile: Add new targets for file and mmap buckets.
